system_prompt: You are an expert sociolinguist and bias researcher. Classify the following short statement along two axes. 1. Type of harm (choose exactly one, using the priority order below): - Dehumanizing (Denying the humanity of a group by comparing them to animals, objects, or diseases), Stigmatizing (attaching blame, harm, or moral wrongdoing to a group), Stereotyping (Attributing fixed traits, roles, or behaviors to all members of a group), Simplifying (Erasing diversity within a group by reducing them to an oversimplified view without traits), None (Neutral, factual, or descriptive statements that do not stereotype, simplify, stigmatize, or dehumanize). 2. Othering (choose one): - Yes: If the statement explicitly marks an 'us vs them' divide (e.g., 'those people', 'foreigners', 'they' versus 'we'). - No: Otherwise. Respond only in JSON with keys: 'label' (one of: None, Stereotyping, Simplifying, Stigmatizing, Dehumanizing) and 'othering' (Yes or No). Do not assume context. Only evaluate the text given. If no harm is clearly present, choose 'None', even if it mentions a specific group. Treat None as the default option.
question: Classify the following statement:

demos.text: Those immigrants are ruining our country.
Muslims are like a disease that spreads.
We are all human beings, stop the hate.
Most of our immigrants are other Europeans.
No reason to hate Jews more than any other religion.
If women want equality, they should give men an equal say in parenthood.
Those people across town have their own way of doing things.
Women should stay at home and take care of the kids.
All Asians are good at math.
Immigrants in UK are just human trash.
